= `valuesToStackReplace` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [valuesToSyntax valuesTo] > [valuesToStackReplaceMethod valuesToStackReplace]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$markup* _Array|String|phpQueryObject_

 * *$values* 

 * *$skipFields*  = `null`

 * *$fieldCallback*  = `null`



Replaces nodes from stack with $markup using replaceWith() insted of markup().


Method doesn't change selected elements stack. Returned is source element,  detached from it's parent.


Example
{{{
 $markups = array('<foo/>', '<bar/>');
 $template`['node1']`->markupToStackOuter($markups);

}}}
Source
{{{
 <node1>
   <node2></node2>
 </node1>
 <node1>
   <node2></node2>
 </node1>

}}}
Result
{{{
 <foo/>
 <bar/>

}}}
----


=== Comments allowed ===
